verses.text: A Song of degrees. They that trust in the LORD, \add shall be\add* as mount Zion, \add which\add* cannot be removed, \add but\add* abideth for ever.
\add As\add* the mountains \add are\add* round Jerusalem, so the LORD \add is\add* around his people from henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands to iniquity.
Do good, O LORD, to \add those that\add* are good, and to \add them that are\add* upright in their hearts.
As for such as turn aside to their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: \add but\add* peace \add shall be\add* upon Israel.
